note:
Boring old fart.
Seen it, done it, can't remember most of it.
Role model: Waldorf.
Many of my toots contain traces of mockery.
Jobs: Carpenter, Soldier, Student, Social Pedagogue, Cartographer in a Forestry Office, Network Admin, IT-Consultant, retired.
Online since 1990, BBS, Usenet, Compu$erve, etc.
Member of
https://cloudappreciationsociety.org
only.
All my photos are under DWTFYWTPL (Do WTF You Want To Public License).
Photos by others are marked as such.
I like beasts.
All beasts!
